definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察還極力敦促他儘快將女兒的遺體火化，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: Dedicated specifically for the preservation of the remains of the Living Buddha Stupa.
sentences.chinese: 靈塔，專門用於保存活佛遺體的佛塔。

sentences.english: A man throws a corpse onto a pile of dead bodies, at the morgue of a hospital in Port-au-Prince.
sentences.chinese: 在太子港一座醫院的停屍處，一名男子拋下一具遺體。

sentences.english: His remains were shipped back and laid away in a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 他的遺體被運回，埋葬在一個公墓裏。

sentences.english: He ordered that Matilda's body should be buried in the family vault.
sentences.chinese: 他指示馬蒂爾達的遺體必須葬在家族墓穴裏。

sentences.english: Unclaimed bodies of the victims, such as rehabilitation work is under way.
sentences.chinese: 遇難者遺體認領等善後工作也正在展開。

sentences.english: Take my body, in mercy, to my home town.
sentences.chinese: 行行好，把我的遺體帶到我的家鄉。

sentences.english: Many of the remains were young or had deformities, such as dwarfism.
sentences.chinese: 許多遺體還很年輕或是有點殘疾，例如矮化。

sentences.english: So he came and took his body.
sentences.chinese: 於是他來把耶穌的遺體領去了。

sentences.english: Eight of the bodies had tabs with clinical data attached to their feet, which showed the bodies were from the subsidiary hospital of Jining Medical University, the investigation has revealed.
sentences.chinese: 根據信息顯示，這些遺體來自濟寧醫學院附屬醫院。

sentences.english: His body was buried in his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 他的遺體被安葬在他的故鄉。

sentences.english: A chartered flight will carry Henry Fok Ying-tung's body to Hong Kong this morning.
sentences.chinese: 霍英東的遺體將於今早由專機運返香港。

sentences.english: It was an ancient graffiti providing evidence of the presence of Peter's body in the necropolis .
sentences.chinese: 這件古老的證物證明了伯多祿的遺體就在這個墓地。

sentences.english: People cant dead, senior around Sun Qian body plunged into grief.
sentences.chinese: 人死不能復生，老資格摟住孫謙的遺體陷入到悲痛中。

sentences.english: The website carried a photo of Van with the figure of his wife, which is still in his home.
sentences.chinese: 該網站刊載了這名男子和亡妻遺體在一起的照片。

sentences.english: Local residents are worried the dumped bodies will have contaminated the drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 當地居民擔心死嬰遺體會對飲用水造成污染。

definition: to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
